summary: Adds a new 1 handed sword called The Shadow Of Death to the game on an NPC in Bleakcoast Cave.
descriptionHtml:
After downloading mods from this community I decided to upload one of my personal retextures I normally use in game...

What is it - A new 1 handed sword called The Shadow Of Death that is added to an NPC in Bleakcoast Cave. It is a retexture of \'the Sword Of Aeons mod by rarborman\' (I have received approval to upload) and a small quest where you will go to Bleakcoast Cave and kill an NPC to take the sword along with a journal that gives the sword a bit of a story (I put more emphasis on what is in the journal instead of an epic boss fight).

Permissions have been given to me by rarborman. (I have also fixed a problem where his weapon used 1 handed animations when it was a 2 handed weapon).

NOTE - For the enchantment effect on the sword I am using Enchantments Upgraded by Aetherius which I recommend since it is by far the best enchantment mod in my eyes.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29316
author: AJ_Jakk and Rarborman
